idea-plugin.name: Base16 XCode Dusk

Base 16 XCode Dusk for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Elsa Gonsiorowski (https://github.com/gonsie). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
